comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Sir Robert Laird Borden PC GCMG KC (26 June 1854 – 10 June 1937) was a Canadian lawyer and politician. He served as the eighth Prime Minister of Canada from 10 October 1911 to 10 July 1920, and was the third Nova Scotian to hold this office. After retiring from public life, he served as the chancellor of Queen's University. Source: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Borden
